Articles.Content:
Find a weird paradox in real life, KSP, or anywhere? Post it here!

 

Here's mine:

Azur Lane, chapter 3, stage 3-1. Drops include Souryuu.

Stage 3-2. Boss: Souryuu. You can use Souryuu to kill Souryuu.

But wait, there's more!

Stage 3-2. Drops include Hiryuu.

Stage 3-3. Boss: Hiryuu. Thus, you can use a kansen to kill THE SAME kansen, twice!

Does a set of all sets contain itself?

Everything I say is a lie

This statement is false

New mission-Refuse this mission!
